mapper.sql: id, customer_id, shop_id, place_order_date, ready_date, emp_id, odetail_id, single_state, take_state
mapper.select: select w.`id`, s.`shop_name`, c.`customer_name`, w.`single_state`, w.`take_state`, w.`place_order_date`, e.`emp_name`, e.`emp_phone`, s.`shop_address`, w.`ready_date` from whole_order w inner join shop s on w.`shop_id` = s.`id` inner join customer c on w.`customer_id` = c.`id` inner join employee e on w.`emp_id` = e.`id` where w.id = #{id}
